Class Game

java.lang.Object
gameLogic.Game
public class Game extends Object
Represents the game logic of a Quarto game. This class maintains the game state, including the board, the current player, the current piece to be placed, and the available pieces.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Game(int currentPlayer)
    Constructs a new Quarto game.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(int currentPlayer)
      Constructs a new Quarto game. Initializes an empty board, sets the starting player, and creates all available pieces.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - the player who starts the game (1 or 2)

  • Method Details

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public int getCurrentPlayer()
      Returns the player whose turn it currently is.
      Returns:
      the current player (1 or 2)

    • getWinner

      public int getWinner()
      Returns the winner of the game.
      Returns:
      the id of the winning player, or 0 if there is no winner

    • isValidMove

      public boolean isValidMove(Move m)
      Checks whether the given move is valid according to the game rules.
      Parameters:
      m - the move to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the move is valid, false otherwise

    • doMove

      public void doMove(Move m)
      Executes the given move. Updates the board, removes used pieces, and switches the player turn.
      Parameters:
      m - the move to execute

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver()
      Checks whether the game is over. The game is over if there is a winner or the board is full.
      Returns:
      true if the game is over, false otherwise

    • getCurrentPieceID

      public int getCurrentPieceID()
      Getter for the current piece id.
      Returns:
      the current piece id.

    • getAvailablePieces

      public Map<Integer,Piece> getAvailablePieces()
      Getter for all available pieces.
      Returns:
      the map with id's as a key, and the value as a piece.

    • getAllPieces

      public Map<Integer,Piece> getAllPieces()
      Getter for all pieces.
      Returns:
      the map with id's as a key, and the value as a piece.

    • getBoard

      public Board getBoard()
      Getter for the board.
      Returns:
      the board.

    • deepCopy

      public Game deepCopy()
      Creates a deep copy of this game.
      Returns:
      a copy of the game

    • isDraw

      public boolean isDraw()
      Method that checks if the result of the game is draw.
      Returns:
      true if it is draw, false if not.
